WORLD GEOGRAPHY.answer: At about 175 miles, it's Europe's westernmost landlocked country

COMPOSERS.question: Frederic Chopin
COMPOSERS.answer: At age 8 this Polish-French composer played a piano concerto by Ghirivetz in public

COMPOSERS.question: J.S. Bach
COMPOSERS.answer: About 200 church cantatas by this composer of "The Goldberg Variations" survive

COMPOSERS.question: Felix Mendelssohn
COMPOSERS.answer: This composer's father, Abraham, converted to Protestantism & appended Bartholdi to the family name

COMPOSERS.question: Claude Debussy
COMPOSERS.answer: This "Clair de Lune" composer orchestrated 2 numbers from Erik Satie's "Gymnopedie"

COMPOSERS.question: Modest Mussorgsky
COMPOSERS.answer: Rimsky-Korsakov's reorchestration of his "A Night on Bald Mountain" debuted after his death

ARTISTS.question: Vincent Van Gogh
ARTISTS.answer: In 1914 his brother's remains were moved from Holland to Auvers, France & buried beside him
